sequence:
Operation: Christmas!

<size=45>Chapter 3: The Shadow over Christmas, Pt. 1</size>

scripts.say: Ah, it's beginning to look a lot like Christmas! Although thinking of Christmas gives me chilling flashbacks to Enty's Santa costume last year...
I don't mind getting presents, but I'd be anxious about having her as our Santa again...
Heh heh heh! Personally, I quite liked her costume! But I say it's time for Sara to take on the role this year and–
No, Sara. No mischief during Christmas. We can't have you causing a ruckus on such a beloved holiday, can we?
Enterprise is away from port on a mission at the moment. It's a little lonely here without her...
Thank gosh for that! I can't for the life of me keep a straight face and accept a present from Santaprise. Let's pick a new Santa, while she's–
Aw, heck! She's not back already, is she?
Greetings, my Eagle Union friends! We were hoping to ask Enterprise a question. Do you know where she is?
Hello there, Warspite. Sadly, Enterprise isn't here. She's out on a mission and hasn't returned yet.
Oh. Well... we wanted to ask her what would make a good present for our friends, since she has experience with being Santa...
Did I hear someone say 'presents'? Sara knows just the girl for you to talk to!
She should be in her room right now. I'll take you to her!
She's also from Eagle Union, I take it? Very well, show us the way!
Is it fine to just ask her directly like that...?
Of course! The Eagle Union is built on openness and freedom! Come on, follow me!
